visuino Package¶

visuino Package¶

The VISUINO project presents an a friendly user interface for visual programming of the Arduino platform.

main Module¶

visuino.main.execute(opengl=None)¶

(bool) -> NoneType

Launch an instance of the Visuino application. The ‘opengl’ flag can be used to force the use of Open GL rendering. If it is None, then the rendering engine will be decided based on the INI settings file.
